title: Linkedin SDE ROLE
content:
Education: B.Tech in Tier 2 college (NIT)
Years of Experience: 2 years
Prior Compensation : 20L Base + ~1.5L Bonus + 5 amazon stocks (Stocks over 4 years)
Company - linkedin [SDE]
Title/Level: SDE-1

Proposed Compensation - Accepted
Location: Bangalore
Base: INR 36,00,000
Signing Bonus: 7,00,000
Relocation Bonus: 1.5L
Stock bonus: 81000 USD over 4 years (33%, 33%, 22%, 12%)
Annual Bonus : 15% of base
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR ~ 72 L (1st year)

Other Benefits
Medical insurance,
Internet reimbursement,
Free onsite food, snacks
Other standard benefits

First compensation proposed was 32L and 65K USD. I tried to negotiate with recruiter citing ongoing interviews at remote AI Companies. Recruiter came back 2 days later with a new number given above

I appeared for around 6 interviews (2 was lean hire, so had to appear 2 extra coding interviews)



I will add interview experience later in sometime.

title: SigFig | SDE - 2 | 32 LPA | August 2023
content:
**Education**: B.Tech in Computer Science(2020 Passout)
**Years of Experience**: 3 years
**Prior Experience**: Software Engineer at Amadeus
**Date of the Offer**: August 2023
**Company**: SigFig
**Title/Level**: SDE - 2
**Location**: Remote/Noida, India
**Salary**: Rs 30,00,000
**Relocation**: NA
**Signing Bonus**: Rs 200000
**Stock Bonus**: 13000 shares vested equally over 4 years
**Bonus**: NA
**Total Comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock)**: ~ Rs 32,00,000
**Benefits**: Work from home set-up remimbursement + Medical Insurance + Wifi Reimbursement + Wellness Benefit and Mental Health Days
**Other Details**: Was given a week to accept or decline the offer.

title: Google | SDE-2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech in Tier 2 college (NIT)
Years of Experience: 2 years
Prior Compensation : 20L Base + ~1.5L Bonus + 5 amazon stocks (Stocks over 4 years) 
Company - Amazon [SDE]
Title/Level: SDE-1

Proposed Compensation - Accepted
Location: Bangalore
Base: INR 36,00,000
Signing Bonus: 7,00,000
Relocation Bonus: 1.5L
Stock bonus: 81000 USD over 4 years (33%, 33%, 22%, 12%)
Annual Bonus : 15% of base
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR ~ 72 L (1st year)

Other Benefits
    Medical insurance,
    Internet reimbursement,
    Free onsite food, snacks
    Other standard benefits

First compensation proposed was 32L and 65K USD. I tried to negotiate with recruiter citing ongoing interviews at remote AI Companies. Recruiter came back 2 days later with a new number given above

I appeared for around 6 interviews (2 was lean hire, so had to appear 2 extra coding interviews)

PS: Was Intially downleveled to SDE1 but got some push for SDE-2 from hiring manager. Took a total of 2 months in total (inclusive of team matching) to get my offer

I will add interview experience later in sometime.

title: PhysicsWallah | SDE - 2 | Frontend developer | Noida | Offer Declined
content:
* Education: B.Tech Computer Engineering
* Years of Experience: 3 years 2 months
* Prior Experience: Product Based
* Date of the Offer: September 2023
* Company: PhysicsWallah
* Title/Level: Software Development Engineer II [Frontend developer]
* Location: Noida
* Base Salary: 22LPA
* Joining Bonus: 1L
* Variable: 1L
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Variable) : 24LPA
* Benefits: Standard benefits

I declined the offer as I was expecting a minimum compensation of around 28-30 LPA.
